H0.text: What is the only U.S. state that borders just one other. US-DE

H1.text: What is the only U.S. state that borders just one other. US-CT

H2.text: What is the only U.S. state that borders just one other. US-ND

H3.text: What is the only U.S. state that borders just one other. US-ME

A4.text: Maine is the only state to border only one other state, which is New Hampshire.
